Traits.Name: Winged
Traits.Description: Gain flying at the start of their turn. Lose flying if shoved, stunned, dazed, or staggered.

Actions.Name: Siren Song
Actions.Description: A character in range 3 must save or become dazed. If already dazed, they become pacified.

Actions.Name: Rise And Fall
Actions.Description: A character in range 1 must save. On a failure, the Harpy may fly up to 3 spaces, carrying the character with them, and drop them onto the ground. The character takes light physical damage and is placed into any adjacent unoccupied space of the Harpyâ€™s choice. Then the harpy may fly up to 3 spaces.
